channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced madcap, stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. Musical Melon joins a grape boy band, Fishing Finger catches more than he can handle, terrifying Count Grape-ula strikes, the toast soldiers ambush an unsuspecting victim, and the thrill-seeking eggs give a cracking performance in the talent show.
